content.p: MPharm Programme Director, BSc in Industrial Chemistry from University of Science, Malaysia. Obtained PhD in Pharmaceutical Technology from School of Pharmacy, University of Science, Malaysia. Currently teaching Pharmaceutics in the School of Pharmacy and contributes to the following modules. MPharm B31ESP Essential Skills for Pharmacist (Pharmaceutics Module Lead) B32AAI Asthma, Allergies and Immune Diseases (Pharmaceutics Module Lead) B32RED Renal and Endocrine Disorder (Module Convener, Pharmaceutics and ADME Lead) B33RPE Research Project (external) BSc in Pharmaceutical and Health Sciences B31A08 Pharmaceutics 1: Physiochemical Science and Medicines Design BP1M01 Practical Dispensing and the Science of Medicines Manufacture (Module Convener) B32C07 Pharmaceutics 2: Pharmaceutical Technology B32C08 Laboratory Studies in Pharmaceutical Sciences B32D05 Biopharmaceutics B33E01 Advanced Drug Delivery B33F07 Pharmaceutical Sciences Research Project Development and characterization of bioadhesive suppository and liquid suppository systems, method development and analysis of drugs in bioequivalence studies. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8018
